summary: The diff implements a comprehensive photo editing web app covering most requirements. All six REQs appear substantially addressed: image upload (REQ-1), transform tools including crop with draggable handles/rotate/flip (REQ-2), filter presets with thumbnails (REQ-3), adjustment sliders (REQ-4), export functionality (REQ-5), and dark-mode professional UI (REQ-6). A few minor gaps are noted due to omitted utility files.

missing_requirements.requirement: At least 7 filter presets are displayed as thumbnail previews below the canvas
missing_requirements.reason: The filterPresets utility file (frontend/src/utils/filterPresets.ts) is among the omitted files due to diff limits, so we cannot confirm whether at least 7 filter presets are actually defined. The FilterStrip component exists and maps over filters, but the actual preset count is unverifiable.

missing_requirements.requirement: Exported image resolution matches the original uploaded image dimensions; all active filters, adjustments, and transformations are baked into the exported file
missing_requirements.reason: The exportImageAsBlob utility is referenced in useImageExport.ts but its implementation is in frontend/src/utils/canvasTransform.ts, which was omitted from the diff due to file limits. We cannot verify that the export renders at full original resolution with all edits baked in.

hallucinated_features.description: Internet Identity authentication integration (login/logout, actor creation, identity provider wrapping the app)
hallucinated_features.reason: The build request does not mention any authentication or Internet Identity login. The diff includes useInternetIdentity.ts, useActor.ts, and InternetIdentityProvider wrapping the app in main.tsx, none of which were requested.
